list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut the hair off one's face with a razor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he washed, shaved, and had breakfast
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh rửa sạch, cạo râu và ăn sáng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut (a thin slice or slices) from the surface of something.
pass or send something close to (something else), missing it narrowly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Scott shaved the post in the 29th minute
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Scott cạo bài đăng vào phút thứ 29

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of shaving hair from the face or a part of the body.
